QuestData.Title: All the Other Stuff
QuestData.Description: If we're going to be on lockdown for any extended period o' time, we're gonna need some food, and some blankets to keep the wee ones warm. Would ye mind headin' outside and gatherin' up some supplies?$b$bYe'll find that a few o' the small boars actually have some healthy-sized haunches... good for eatin'. We'll also need some pelts from the young wolves.$b$bYe'll find animals almost anywhere ye go in Coldridge.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 3 Boar Haunches and 4 Ragged Wolf Hides.
QuestData.CompletionText: The people are gettin' restless. D'ye have the supplies yet?
QuestData.RewardText: This'll have to do for now. We've a lot of people to feed here, but we've got to make do with what we've got. With any luck, King Bronzebeard in Ironforge will send us some help shortly.
